languages.text: "Лишь для глупцов весы есть символ беспристрастного суждения. Мудрый же знает — ловкая рука легко качнет чашу в нужную сторону".
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Examining the giant scales.

traits.locale_text: "Лишь для глупцов весы есть символ беспристрастного суждения. Мудрый же знает — ловкая рука легко качнет чашу в нужную сторону".

languages.text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."
languages.translation_comment: Palace of Justice, after judging the RT's subjects. Examining the giant scales.
languages.original_text: "Лишь для глупцов весы есть символ беспристрастного суждения. Мудрый же знает — ловкая рука легко качнет чашу в нужную сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

"Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

languages.text: 「天秤を帝国の裁きの象徴と見るのは愚か者だけよ。賢い人は知ってるわ―巧みな手さえあれば、天秤は常に正しい方向に傾くんだって」
languages.original_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: 「天秤を帝国の裁きの象徴と見るのは愚か者だけよ。賢い人は知ってるわ―巧みな手さえあれば、天秤は常に正しい方向に傾くんだって」

languages.text: "Nur ein Narr sieht die Waage als Symbol eines unparteiischen Urteils. Wer klug ist, der weiß: Eine geschickte Hand kann immer dafür sorgen, dass die Waagschale sich in die richtige Richtung neigt."
languages.original_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein Narr sieht die Waage als Symbol eines unparteiischen Urteils. Wer klug ist, der weiß: Eine geschickte Hand kann immer dafür sorgen, dass die Waagschale sich in die richtige Richtung neigt."

languages.text: « Seuls les imbéciles voient dans cette balance un symbole de jugement impartial. Les sages savent qu'une main habile la fait toujours pencher du bon côté. »
languages.original_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: « Seuls les imbéciles voient dans cette balance un symbole de jugement impartial. Les sages savent qu'une main habile la fait toujours pencher du bon côté. »

languages.text: «Solo un necio interpreta la balanza como un símbolo de juicio imparcial. Cualquiera con dos dedos de frente sabe que una mano hábil siempre inclina la balanza en la dirección adecuada».
languages.original_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: «Solo un necio interpreta la balanza como un símbolo de juicio imparcial. Cualquiera con dos dedos de frente sabe que una mano hábil siempre inclina la balanza en la dirección adecuada».

languages.text: “只有蠢人才会把天平当做公平公正的象征。聪明人明白，只要手够巧，总可以找到方法，让天平朝正确的方向倾斜。”
languages.original_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: “只有蠢人才会把天平当做公平公正的象征。聪明人明白，只要手够巧，总可以找到方法，让天平朝正确的方向倾斜。”

languages.text: "Teraziyi tarafsız yargının simgesi olarak görmek için aptal olmak lazım. Ağırlığı el yordamıyla doğru tarafa vermek mümkün, azıcık akıllı olan herkes bunu bilir."
languages.original_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."

traits.locale_text: "Teraziyi tarafsız yargının simgesi olarak görmek için aptal olmak lazım. Ağırlığı el yordamıyla doğru tarafa vermek mümkün, azıcık akıllı olan herkes bunu bilir."

languages.original_text: "Only a fool sees the scales as a symbol of impartial judgement. A wise person knows that a deft hand will always tip the scales in the right direction."
